extracted_metadata.title: Foreword + First panel | Live testimonies: Zalman Arazi, Jewish witness – 1948 fighter
extracted_metadata.description: Truth Commission on the Responsibility of Israeli Society for the Events of 1948-1960 in the South Public Event on Wednesday, December 10, 2014 in Beersheba / Bir al-Saba’ 10:00-19:00 Foreword by the Commission Chair + First panel | Live testimonies: Zalman Arazi "Tzofen", Jewish witness – 1948 fighter
